spec_data.Name: perl-Mail-Box
spec_data.Description:
The Mail::Box folder is a modern mail-folder manager -- at least at
the moment of this writing ;)  It is written to replace Mail::Folder,
although its interface is different.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:54:11 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Manage a mailbox, a folder with messages
